poemsDataJson.list_full: 山里(やまざと)は 冬(ふゆ)ぞさびしさ まさりける 人目(ひとめ)も草(くさ)も かれぬと思(おも)へば
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: Winter loneliness//In a mountain village grows//Only deeper, when//Guests are gone, and leaves and grass//Are withered: troubling thoughts.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Yama-zato wa|Fuyu zo sabishisa|Masari keru|Hitome mo kusa mo|Karenu to omoeba
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: ひとめもくさも かれぬとおもへは
poemsDataJson.author: 源宗于朝臣(みなもとのむねゆきあそん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 人も訪れず草も枯れてしまう冬の山里の寂寥感
